CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: PC 70 BM was also used as an acceptor because it has similar electronic properties as PCBM , but a higher absorption coefficient in the visible region , which can compensate for the poor absorption of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) in this range.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PC 70 BM |
| PCBM |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PC 70 BM |
| PCBM |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |

Explanation:

PC 70 BM and PCBM are clearly identified as materials in the paragraph, as they are named compounds. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) is also identified as a material, as it is mentioned as having poor absorption in the visible region and being compensated by PC 70 BM.
